comment: Great professor! Very helpful and communicative. I learned a lot in this class and thoroughly enjoyed it, I would definitely recommend taking him!

The quizzes and exams are open book and the exams are almost completely the quiz questions. The professor was a bit hands off. Rarely answers emails but because the exams and quizzes are open book you can be able pass the class.

He is an ok professor. I emailed him twice and he only responded once. Another student said he was having problems getting him to respond as well. This class is fairly easy but has a lot of reading. The quizzes and exams are open book and the exams are almost completely the quiz questions. Some of the quizzes are still fairly hard though.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This class was made very easy by Professor. He would email us three times a week to remind us of deadlines. All you have to do is dicussions, quizzes, three homeworks, and two test. It was a very easy course; as long as you do everything by their deadlines it is a very easy A. Also you learn a lot from doing the discussions, should take him!!
